name: Barter in Blood
description:
A shoot-em-up roguelike with a twist - at the start you get to choose how much life to pay for an advantage in the game. Will you pay all your life except 1 for the best bonuses? Or will you refuse to deal with the devil and go in without anything? It’s all up to you in Barter in Blood.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Enter or Z to shoot

IF YOU WANT TO BE ABLE TO SKIP / RESTART, PLAY THE GAME HERE : https://snowinn.itch.io/barter-in-blood-v2 This is solely to help you play the game and should not be a factor in rating the game because these features were added after the 72 hour period.
